learningpod.title: Kaplan Kids (Reading): [IMAGE] Based on its role in this sentence, what can you tell about the word admiral ?

p.b: The admiral joined the Navy 30 years ago.

questionBody.p: Based on its role in this sentence, what can you tell about the word admiral ?

simpleChoice.p: The word admiral is a noun, and it is a place where Navy people go.
The word admiral is a verb, and it describes what people in the Navy do.
The word admiral is a noun, and it is a type of person in the Navy.
The word admiral is an adjective, and it describes the Navy.
